item.title: umi-ui bug using react-document-title
item.description: 背景 React 项目使用umi时发报： Uncaught Invariant Violation: React.Children.only expected to receive a single React element child. The above error occurred in the component ui socket init CloseEvent {type: “close”, bubbles: false, cancelable: false, timeStamp: 1571127775342, wasClean: false, …} 异常代码 <DocumentTitle title={this.renderPageTitle()}> <ContainerQuery query={query}> {(params: any) => <div className={classNames(params)}>{layout}</div>} </ContainerQuery> </DocumentTitle> Docume
